description: This file defines a FastAPI router for handling user progress data. It includes an endpoint '/progress' which returns the current user's progress on modules, utilizing dependencies for user authentication and database session management.

methods.name: my_progress(user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve the current user's progress data from the database and return it as a list of ProgressOut schemas.

ctags.name: my_progress
ctags.pattern: /^def my_progress(user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
